meanings.definition: Situated or carried on within the walls of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The intermural playground was located inside the city limits.
meanings.sent2: The intermural library serves the local community.
meanings.sent3: The intermural picnic was a hit with the townspeople.
meanings.sent4: Her intermural art project captured the essence of urban life.
meanings.sent5: The intermural market bustled with activity within the city walls.

meanings.definition: Situated or carried on within the walls of a building.
meanings.sent1: The intermural gym is popular among residents.
meanings.sent2: The intermural offices are conveniently located inside the building.
meanings.sent3: The intermural party in the building was a blast.
meanings.sent4: His intermural painting adorned the walls beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The intermural cafe inside the building serves delicious coffee.

meanings.definition: Situated or carried on within the walls of an institution.
meanings.sent1: The intermural classes at the school are engaging.
meanings.sent2: The intermural meetings take place within the institution.
meanings.sent3: The intermural event at the institution was a success.
meanings.sent4: Their intermural research within the institution yielded interesting results.
meanings.sent5: The intermural program within the institution promotes student involvement.
